data.description:

data.name: Shield Bash

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)

If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue forward unhindered.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

data.name: Jagged Counter
data.description: Counter attacks inflict bleeding for ${6}s for each power level. Each stack deals ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)

data.name: Critical Calamity
data.description:
Counter attack crit chance is increased by ${25}%.

In onslaught stance, the counter attack gains an additional ${25}% critical hit chance.

In defiant stance, the counter attack heals for ${20}% of its damage. (Max ${5} hits.)

data.name: Steadfast Strike
data.description:
Stab your greatsword forward to impale your foes, then pull back to rip the blade out. Restores ${20} stamina on each hit.

First Hit: ${40}% weapon damage and staggers.
Second Hit: ${120}% weapon damage and pulls target ${1.5}m towards you.

This ability generates ${150}%  threat.

Enter defiant stance after the second attack of this ability ends.

data.name: Steadfast Recovery
data.description:
If the first strike of Steadfast Strike hits, you are healed for ${50}% weapon damage.

In defiant stance, the first strike also inflicts 2 stacks of bleeding for ${6}s which deals ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)

data.name: Steadfast Refresh
data.description: If the second strike of Steadfast Strike hits, reduce the cooldown of all other greatsword abilities by ${20}%.

data.name: Roaring Rupture
data.description:
Stab the ground and send out a shockwave with a ${4}m radius that deals ${120}% weapon damage. Gain ${10}%  fortify for ${7}s for each foe hit. (Max ${3} stacks.)

This ability generates ${200}%  threat and has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Enter defiant stance when this ability ends.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

data.name: Purifying Roar
data.description: Cleanse ${2}  debuffs after using Roaring Rupture.

data.name: Adaptive Rupture
data.description:
In defiant stance, the shockwave pushes foes outward ${3}m.

In onslaught stance, the shockwave pulls foes ${3}m towards you.

data.name: Intimidating Roar
data.description: The shockwave applies a ${10}%  weaken for ${10}s on hit. Additionally, after a successful hit become uninterruptible for ${5}s.

data.name: Perfect Vigilance
data.description: If you are hit while at full health, reduce the damage taken by ${20}% then gain a ${20}%  fortify for ${3}s. (This effect has a ${20}s cooldown.)

data.name: Cleansing Chain
data.description: Hitting with the final attack of the greatsword chain reduces the duration of debuffs on you by ${10}%. (This effect has a ${5}s cooldown.)

data.name: Blade Honing
data.description: For each greatsword buff on you, base damage increases by ${3}%. (Max ${4} buffs.)

data.name: Wary Posture
data.description:
After gaining defiant stance you will also gain fortify, increasing your armor by ${25}% for the next hit taken within ${5}s.

(Does not apply to damage from debuffs.)

data.name: Guarded Shift
data.description:
Blocking for ${2}s causes you to enter defiant stance. 

(You must be in combat for this effect to activate. This effect will not renew defiant stance if it is already active.)

data.name: Unflinching Blade
data.description: Charged heavy attacks have grit and inflict bleeding for ${6}s dealing ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)

data.name: Arrow Deflection
data.description:
You can now block 100% of the ranged attack damage while using a greatsword. 

Additionally, you also reduce the stamina damage from all attacks while blocking by ${10}%.

data.name: Faultless Defender
data.description:
Reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt by ${50}% when blocking attacks just after raising your guard or with guard point. 

Blocking attacks within this window inflicts a ${5}%  rend for ${10}s against melee attackers. (Max ${3} stacks.)

data.name: Undying Defiance
data.description:
Heal for ${5}% of the damage from attacks.

Attacking within ${3}s of blocking an attack heals for ${15}% of the damage dealt instead.

data.name: Path of Onslaught
data.description:
After completing any ability in the Onslaught tree, enter onslaught stance for ${10}s.

Onslaught stance has the following properties:
 Outgoing Damage Increased: ${15}%
 Damage Taken Increased: ${15}%
 Quick Charge: Heavy attacks charge 50% faster if you have ${10} stamina to consume

(Entering defiant stance or switching weapons will immediately end onslaught stance.)

data.name: Path of Defiance
data.description:
After completing any ability in the Defiance tree, enter defiant stance for ${10}s.

Defiant stance has the following properties:
 Damage Taken Reduced: ${-15}%
 Outgoing Damage Reduced: ${-15}%
 Guard Point: Block incoming attacks while charging heavy attacks 

(Entering onslaught stance or switching weapons will immediately end defiant stance.)

data.name: Arcane Smite
data.description:
Leap forward and strike the ground with arcane force dealing ${130}% weapon damage to all targets within ${2.7}m of the impact. 
	

Leave behind a hazardous area at the impact point that inflicts a stack of Impairment for ${6}s to all targets that enter.
	

Impairment deals ${10}%weapon damage per second and weakens the target, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks.)
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

data.name: Epic Flail
data.description: Smite hits reduce its own cooldown by ${5}% per target hit. (Max ${5} targets.)

data.name: Ironclad Superiority
data.description:
Grants a bonus based on what shield type is equipped:
	

 Round Shield - Smite deals ${20}% more base weapon damage.
	
 Kite Shield - Smite will now stagger targets hit, but damage is reduced to ${90}% weapon damage.
	
 Tower Shield - Gain ${30}%  fortify for ${6}s when smite is activated. (Fortify increases armor.)

data.name: Deflecting Frailty
data.description:
Allies that enter the hazardous area gain Deflecting Frailty for ${3}s. Deflecting Frailty is a buff which, when receiving an attack, will inflict a stackable weakening effect to enemy attackers, reducing the enemy's damage dealt by ${5}% per stack for ${5}s. (Max ${5} stacks.)
	

Additionally while the effect is active, when allies are hit, they gain ${15}% lifesteal for  ${3}s. 

(Deflecting Frailty scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to ${12} seconds.)

data.name: Arcane Vortex
data.description:
Swirl the flail above the player's head dealing 4 rapid hits of ${75}% weapon damage in a 3m radius around the player. 
	

After the first spin is completed, trigger a ${3}m blast of energy granting ${10}% empower for ${5}s to all allies inside the radius. 

Arcane Vortex can be block/dodge cancelled after the 2nd attack.
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

data.name: Flailbird
data.description: Hitting targets ${4} times with Arcane Vortex will inflict them with root, immobilizing them for ${1}s.

data.name: Accelerated Advantage
data.description:
Hitting a target with Arcane Vortex grants a stacking haste on self, increasing movement speed by ${5}% for ${7}s. (Max ${4} stacks.) 
	

Allies within the radius of the attack are granted a ${20}%  haste for ${5}s.

data.name: Flailing Stability
data.description:
All allies within ${3}m of player during the Arcane Vortex are cleansed of crowd control status effects (Root, Stun, Slow) and are immune to them for ${1} seconds. 
	

All allies inside are also healed for ${65}% weapon damage. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) 

(Crowd Control Immunity scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to ${5} seconds.)

data.name: Arcane Eruption
data.description:
Drag the head of the flail against the ground causing an eruption of arcane energy in front of the player, dealing ${120}% weapon damage and inflicting two stacks of Impairment for ${6}s to all targets hit.
	

Automatically follow up with an additional melee attack that deals ${150}% weapon damage.
	

Impairment deals ${10}% weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks.)

data.name: Crippling Strike
data.description: Targets hit with the first attack of burst are slowed, reducing their movement speed by ${40}% for ${3}s.

data.name: Debilitating Extension
data.description: The follow up attack extends the duration of all debilitate status effects (Rend, Weaken, Exhaust, Disease) on the target by ${30}%.

data.name: Supportive Blessing
data.description:
The follow up attack triggers a chain that will bounce up to ${4} times to allies within ${6}m of player, granting ${130}% of its total damage as health to each ally it chains to, and ${35}% of its total damage to self. 

(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)

data.name: Oppressive Advantage
data.description:
Abilities and Heavy attack hits against targets with less than ${50}% health, increase incoming healing by ${5}% and gain ${7.000000000000001}%  haste to self for ${3}s. 
(Incoming healing increase scales with Focus, increasing its power to up to ${20}%.) 
	

(Haste increases movement speed.)

data.name: Weighted Superiority
data.description:
Grants Cooldown Reduction based on actions performed in different equip loads:
	

 Heavy - ${1}% cooldown reduction when hit or blocking a hit. (${0.5}s cooldown.) 
	
 Medium - 
	${5}% cooldown reduction when dodging an attack. (${1}s cooldown.) 
	
 Light - ${1}% cooldown reduction when hitting a target. (${1}s cooldown.)

data.name: Happy Flails
data.description: Hitting a target with a basic attack within ${3}s of using an ability will inflict exhaust, reducing stamina regen rate by ${15}% for ${5}s.

data.name: Spiky Impairment
data.description:
Being hit or blocking a hit from a melee attack while above ${90}% health inflicts a stack of Impairment for ${6}s on the attacker, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and inflicting weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks.) 

(${5}s cooldown.)

data.name: Vital Embrace
data.description:
While at or below ${50}% health, all flail attacks grant ${3}% lifesteal while attacking targets. (Max ${3} targets.)
	

While above ${50}% health, all flail attacks extend the duration of damage over time effects on targets by ${7.000000000000001}%.

data.name: Leader of the Pack
data.description:
When no allies are within ${5}m, all flail attacks deal ${15}% more base damage.
	

When 1 or more allies are within ${5}m, they gain empower, increasing their damage dealt by ${10}%.

data.name: Better Together
data.description:
While near ${1} or more allies, grant passive healing to self and all allies that heals for ${16}% weapon damage every ${3} seconds. 
	

Range of heal aura varies based on what equip load the player is:
	
 Light - ${5}m radius area of effect. 
	
 Medium - ${4}m radius area of effect. 
	
 Heavy - ${3}m radius area of effect. 
	

(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)

data.name: Barrage
data.description:
Sprint forward up to 10m. Upon reactivating the ability, pressing basic attack, or reaching the end of the sprint, leap forward up to an additional 3m and slam to the ground, dealing ${30}% weapon damage to targets in range of the flail during the leap and ${80}% weapon damage upon landing, staggering targets on impact.
	

(Character collision is disabled while sprinting forward.)
	

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

data.name: Defensive Rush
data.description:
Hitting a target with any of barrage's hits will grant a ${30}% fortify. The fortify has a ${2}s duration, and every hit extends the duration of the status effect by ${2}s to a max of ${8}s.
	

(Moving through targets with the Bulldoze upgrade will also extend the duration of the effect.)

data.name: Abiding Superiority
data.description:
Grants a bonus to Barrage based on what shield type is equipped:
	

 Round Shield - Barrage hits for ${30}% more base weapon damage.
	
 Kite Shield - Barrage hits inflict ${20}%  slow for 
	${4}s. (This will also slow targets moved through with the Bulldoze upgrade.)
	
 Tower Shield - Barrage gains grit while active.
	

(Slow reduces movement speed.) 
	
(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

data.name: Bulldoze
data.description: Barrage can now block attacks while charging forward without consuming stamina, and will push all enemies moved through to the side. \n\n(This will also cause the targets moved through to be taunted if using a carnelian gem.)

data.name: Flailure to Launch
data.description: Barrage's attack now triggers a ${2.5}m blast of energy around the target on hit, dealing ${35}% weapon damage to all nearby targets, and granting fortify to all allies within the radius, increasing armor by ${20}% for ${8}s.

data.name: Trip
data.description: Swing the Flail forward latching onto a target dealing ${50}% weapon damage and knocking them to the ground.

data.name: Flailing Duration
data.description: Tripping a target applies a special debuff to the target lasting ${3}s. Allies that hit the affected enemy will reduce the duration of all damage over time effects on themselves by 10% per hit while active. (${1}s cooldown.)

data.name: You've Got Flail
data.description:
Hitting weakened targets with trip will inflict ${15}% rend for ${5}s on the target, and granting ${15}%  fortify on self for ${5}s.
	

(Rend reduces target's armor.) 
	
(Fortify increases your armor.)

data.name: Destabilize
data.description: Reactivate this ability or use basic attack to add a follow up heavy attack that deals ${145}% weapon damage.

data.name: Warding Bludgeon
data.description:
Perform a spinning leap then swing the flail down to strike targets, dealing ${100}% weapon damage.
	

While leaping, trigger a burst of energy, granting a reinforced fortify to self and all allies within 3m of player, increasing armor by ${50}% for ${8}s or until ${3} hits are taken. 
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
	

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

data.name: Stable Impairment
data.description:
Stamina damage taken is reduced by ${25}% for ${0.5}s after activating block. 

Additionally, blocking hits while the reinforced fortify from Warding Bludgeon is active will Inflict a stack of  Impairment for ${6}s on the attacker, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks.)

data.name: Best Friends
data.description:
Upon hitting an enemy target, a nearby ally within ${6}m is selected and you become linked to them. While the connection is active, they gain empower, increasing their base damage by ${15}%, and you both gain damage absorption, reducing damage taken by ${10}% for ${8}s, or until players are more than ${6}m apart from each other.

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

data.name: Vital Suppressant
data.description:
While at or above ${50}% health, reduce damage taken by ${4}%.
	

While below ${50}% health, reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt while blocking by ${10}%.

data.name: Cured Flailment
data.description: The first target hit with a heavy attack within ${3}s of using an ability will cleanse ${1} stack of any debuff from self, and will also inflict a stack of Impairment for ${6}s to the target hit, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks.)

data.name: Reductive Superiority
data.description:
Grants status effect duration modifications on self based on what shield type is equipped:
	

 Round Shield - Increased base duration of all limited duration buffs on player by ${10}%
	
 Kite Shield - Decrease base duration of damage over time and debilitating effects on player by ${10}% 
	
 Tower Shield - Decrease base duration of crowd control effects on player by ${10}%

data.name: Flail Mary
data.description: While stamina is at or below ${30}%, activating an ability will grant ${15} stamina. (${5}s cooldown.)

data.name: Mitigated Protection
data.description:
When blocking a hit, gain a \$\{${3.000000}\}s tracking status effect, every blocked hit extends the duration of the status effect by \$\{${3.000000}\}s to a max of \$\{${9.000000}\}s, and while the effect is active, gain variable damage absorption based on current health percent and equip load:
	

 Heavy - 5% absorption at full health increasing to a max of \$\{${#VALUE! * 100}\}% mitigation as health decreases
	
 Medium - 3% absorption at full health increasing to a max of \$\{${#VALUE! * 100}\}% mitigation as health decreases
	
 Light - 1% absorption at full health increasing to a max of \$\{${#VALUE! * 100}\}% mitigation as health decreases

data.name: Reinforced Vitality
data.description:
Increase your max health by ${25}% of your physical armor rating while the flail is equipped.

(This effect is active as long as the flail is equipped, even if the flail is sheathed.)

data.name: Human Shield
data.description:
Hitting a target with an ability while within ${6}m of an ally, applies a status effect linking yourself and a single ally to each other for ${5}s. While the effect is active the ally will only take ${50}% of the incoming damage and causing you to inherit ${35}% of the incoming damage they didn't take. 
	

(Cannot be applied to targets that already have this effect, or self if you already have the effect applied to an ally.)
